name: LiveME T-Shirt (Black Aqua)
description:
Show off your Maine state pride with the LiveME t-shirt. Live Maine. Available in unisex fits in black aqua with lime green print. Printed on American Apparel 50/50, an ultra-soft, ultra-comfy unisex T-shirt that feels like you’ve owned it for years the moment you put it on, and for years to come.

  • 50/50 (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton)
  • Hand printed in Portland, ME
  • Printed using soft touch water based inks
  • Printed on American Apparel
  • Slim, comfortable fit
  • LiveMaine mark on left sleeve
  • American Apparel tends to run small and shrink some after wash, if in doubt order a size larger
  • Add $2 for sizes XXL and larger

name: FishME Patch Trucker Hat
description:
Made for salt water expeditions and fresh water excursions, this is our classic action cap. It features a two color embroidered FishME patch on the front and is made of 100% cotton twill fabric in front and 100% polyester mesh in back to keep things cool. The retro styling features a generous, shapeable bill and an adjustable tab at the back for a sweet fit.

  • Assembled in Portland, Maine
  • Custom embroidered 2.25" patch
  • 100% cotton twill front
  • 100% polyester mesh back
  • 6-panel mid crown cap
  • Pliable bill for comfort
  • Moisture-wicking headband
  • Adjustable snap-back closure

description:

name: FeedME Grocery Tote
description:
Help Feed Maine with a FeedME grocery tote. 20% of each sale goes back to Good Shepherd Food Bank to help them supply food and resources to kitchens and food pantries across the state of Maine. Every $1 donated equates to 4 meals for Mainers in need.


THIS IS A PRE-ORDER ITEM. ALL ORDERS WILL SHIP AFTER SEPTEMBER 30.

  • Durable, water-resistant non-woven polypropylene
  • Reusable and hand-washable
  • Spacious 8.5" gusset
  • Reinforced 20” handles
  • Perfect for grocery stores and markets
  • 12.375" W x 14" H x 8.65" D

name: BeerME - Ultimate Disc
description:
Wrap your mitts around the Backyard Flyer™ It's the ultimate disc for ultimate good times! Perfect for a backyard game of Polish Horseshoes, a friendly game of ultimate or just tossing around on the beach. Each disc comes in a hand tagged bag with a BeerME sticker and instructions on how to play polish horseshoes. Check out the official rules here.

  • 175 grams
  • 10.75 inches in diamter
  • Holds 56 fluid ounces (4.66 beers)
  • Printed on a Discraft™ Ultra-Star 175, the world standard for Ultimate
  • Official disc of the USA Ultimate Championship Series
  • Features a contoured grip and aerodynamic engineering
  • Blaze orange color makes it easy to find!

name: BeerME - Backyard Toolkit
description:
The perfect toolkit for backyard parties and bbqs. Includes one BeerME ultimate disc and 4 BeerME collapsible koozies. Get it started!

  • 175 grams
  • 10.75 inches in diamter
  • Holds 56 fluid ounces (4.66 beers)
  • Printed on a Discraft™ Ultra-Star 175, the world standard for Ultimate
  • Official disc of the USA Ultimate Championship Series
  • Features a contoured grip and aerodynamic engineering
  • Blaze orange color makes it easy to find!

name: LoveME - Camp Mug
description:
A classic mason jar styled mug, perfect for just about anything. Take a set upta camp! *Not reccomended for hot liquids.

  • 16 oz mason jar mug
  • Maroon print on clear glass
  • Made in America by Libbey Glass

LoveME Camp Mugs make great wedding favors and signature glassware. Contact us for information and pricing on large orders and personalization.

name: LoveME - Camp Mug (4-Pack)
description:
A classic mason jar styled mug, perfect for just about anything. Take a set upta camp! *Not reccomended for hot liquids. NOTE: If 3 or more sets are desired Please contact us before ordering for accurate shipping rates.

  • 16 oz mason jar mug
  • Maroon print on clear glass

LoveME Camp Mugs make great wedding favors and signature glassware. Contact us for information and pricing on large orders and personalization.

name: BeerME Pint Glass
description:
Fill with your favorite Maine brew. Maybe even a home brew.

  • 16 oz pint glass
  • Orange print on clear glass
  • Made in America by Libbey Glass

name: BeerME - Pint Glass (4-Pack)
description:
Fill with your favorite Maine brew. Maybe even a home brew. NOTE: If 3 or more sets are desired Please contact us before ordering for accurate shipping rates.

  • 16 oz pint glass
  • Orange print on clear glass
  • Made in America by Libbey Glass

name: BeerME - Beverage Key
description:
A credit card style bottle opener that tucks away easily into any wallet. Also doubles as a great wax scraper for skiers and riders.

  • Anodized red aluminum
  • Super slim and lightweight
  • Durable design
  • Scratch resistant imprint
  • Made in USA

name: BeerME - Foam Koozie
description:
A high visibilty all occasion foam insulator. Take one upta camp!

  • Blaze Orange
  • Made of foam
  • Keeps beer cold
  • Keeps beer safe
  • Fits 12-16oz cans and some bottles

name: BeerME - Foam Koozie (4-pack)
description:
Bundle up and save a few bucks! Take home a set of four BeerME koozies and share with some friends.

  • Blaze Orange
  • Made of foam
  • Keeps beer cold
  • Keeps beer safe
  • Fits 12-16oz cans and some bottles

name: BeerME - Collapsible Koozie
description:
Made in the USA from 1/8" scuba neoprene foam, these BeerME koozies collapse to fit in your pocket or for easy storage or transport. High visibility so you'll never lose track of your drink!

  • Blaze Orange
  • 3mm Neoprene
  • Keeps beer cold
  • Packs away easily
  • Fits 12oz cans and bottles

name: BeerME - Collapsible Koozie (4-Pack)
description:
Bundle up and save a few bucks! Take home a set of four BeerME collapsible koozies and share with some friends. These BeerME koozies are made in the USA from 1/8" scuba neoprene foam and collapse to fit in your pocket or for easy storage or transport.

  • Blaze Orange
  • 3mm Neoprene
  • Keeps beer cold
  • Packs away easily
  • Fits 12oz cans and bottles

name: BeerME - Beverage Utility Kit
description:
You've seen some of our handy BeerME products individually and now we're giving you a chance to save a few bucks with the BeerME Beverage Utility Kit. A quick rundown of what you're getting: Two (2) BeerME Foam Koozies, two (2) 16 oz BeerME Pint Glasses, and one (1) Beverage Key

  • 1 credit card style alluminum bottle oppener
  • 2 foam koozies
  • 2 pint glasses

name: BoneME - Dog T-Shirt
description:
Gotta Maine dog that loves bones? Give them an opportunity to show it off with the BoneME dog t-shirt.

  • 100% Baby Rib cotton construction
  • Hand printed in Portland, Maine on American Apparel
  • Printed with "soft touch" water based ink
  • Durable rib neckband
  • Shrinkage: will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer
  • See sizing chart for fit details
  • See measurement chart for shirt specs

name: LoveME Postcard
description:
West Quoddy Head Lighthouse Located in Lubec, and at the easternmost point in the United States, this lighthouse is one of three places to catch America’s first sunrise. But you’ll have to get up early to glimpse the show—summer sunrise starts at 4 A.M. - Love Maine

  • Dimensions: 4" x 6"
  • 12 pt semi-gloss stock
  • Printed in Portland, ME

name: SailME Postcard
description:
The Casco Bay Home to 136 islands, the Casco Bay stretches from Cape Small at its easternmost point, to Two Lights in Cape Elizabeth. Walter Cronkite once said the bay offered some of the best sailing in the world. But you’ll have to experience it for yourself. - Sail Maine

  • Dimensions: 4" x 6"
  • 12 pt semi-gloss stock
  • Printed in Portland, ME

name: HikeME Postcard
description:
Tumbledown Mountain Located in western Maine near the town of Weld, with an elevation of 3068' this little mountain packs a punch. It’s distinguished by an alpine pond known locally as Crater Lake. Clothing optional. - Hike Maine

  • Dimensions: 4" x 6"
  • 12 pt semi-gloss stock
  • Printed in Portland, ME

name: SurfME Postcard
description:
Summer Session One of several sandy beaches that contrast the rugged coast of Maine, this majestic beach boasts an intense wave with fast lefts and rights. Play the winds and the tide right, and you’ll have a day to remember—but you’ll have to find it first. - Surf Maine

  • Dimensions: 4" x 6"
  • 12 pt semi-gloss stock
  • Printed in Portland, ME

name: BeerME Postcard
description:
Beer Goggles Maine is home to more than 20 microbreweries and counting. With so many styles of beer, it’s no surprise that you’ll want to try them all ... just not all at once. - Beer Maine

  • Dimensions: 4" x 6"
  • 12 pt semi-gloss stock
  • Printed in Portland, ME

name: HuntME Patch
description:
Channel your inner outdoorsmen with a HuntME patch. It's the perfect size for vests and jackets.

  • 2.75" x 2.75" square with rounded corners
  • 2 color embroidery
